title: User Signup Success
description: Verify that a user can successfully sign up with valid details and receives confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to signup page
Fill signup form with valid email, password, and referral code (optional)
Submit signup form
Confirm account creation is successful and user is redirected to onboarding

title: User Signup with Existing Email
description: Verify that signing up with an existing email address shows appropriate error message.

steps.description: Navigate to signup page
Fill signup form with an already registered email
Submit signup form
Verify error message indicating email is already in use is displayed

title: Login Success
description: Check login is successful with correct credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid email and password
Click login button
User is logged in and redirected to onboarding or dashboard if already onboarded

title: Login Failure with Incorrect Password
description: Verify login fails with incorrect password and shows error notification.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter valid email with incorrect password
Click login button
Login fails and error message is displayed

title: Password Reset Request
description: Verify that users can request password reset and receive reset instructions.

steps.description: Navigate to forgot password page
Enter registered email and submit request
Confirm password reset instructions sent notification is shown

title: Password Reset with Valid Token
description: Verify users can reset password successfully with valid reset token link.

steps.description: Navigate to password reset page with valid token
Enter and confirm new password
Submit new password
Password is updated and user is notified of successful reset

title: Landing Page Load Performance
description: Verify landing page loads within 2 seconds with Lighthouse score 90+.

steps.description: Navigate to landing page
Page load time is under 2 seconds
Lighthouse performance score is 90 or above for desktop and mobile

title: User Onboarding Success Flow
description: Verify user completes onboarding flow within 12 minutes with progressive validations.

steps.description: Login as a new user and proceed to onboarding
Complete KYC step with valid Aadhaar and PAN details
KYC details accepted and verified
Link utility provider and billing details successfully
Utility details saved and linked to user profile
Select a solar project and reserve capacity using slider
Selected capacity is within availability and reflected in UI
Proceed to Razorpay payment and complete payment successfully
Payment is confirmed and user is redirected to dashboard
Total onboarding duration is less than or equal to 12 minutes

title: KYC Verification Failure with Invalid Data
description: Verify KYC verification fails appropriately with invalid Aadhaar or PAN details.

steps.description: Submit onboarding KYC form with invalid Aadhaar or PAN numbers
KYC verification API returns failure and error is shown to user

title: Project Capacity Reservation Limits
description: Verify users cannot reserve solar capacity beyond project availability.

steps.description: Navigate to project reservation page and select a project
Attempt to reserve solar capacity exceeding available capacity using slider
UI prevents capacity selection beyond available limit
Try to submit reservation with invalid capacity via API
API returns validation error and reservation is rejected

title: Payment Processing via Razorpay
description: Verify successful payment processing, order creation, and webhook handling with Razorpay.

steps.description: Trigger payment initiation for a solar capacity reservation
Payment order is created correctly with Razorpay API
Complete payment successfully in Razorpay UI or sandbox
Webhook is received and payment status updated in system
User receives payment confirmation notification

title: Credit Calculation Engine Accuracy
description: Verify that credit calculation engine generates accurate, audited credit entries.

steps.description: Provide monthly solar generation data input for known scenarios
Calculated credits match expected values per calculation rules
Credit ledger entries are created with versioning and audit trail
Attempt manual credit override
Override is accepted or rejected based on business rules and logged

title: Monthly Bill Fetching and Display
description: Verify monthly bills are auto-fetched via BBPS API and displayed correctly in dashboard.

steps.description: Ensure utility account is linked for a user
Trigger monthly bill fetching job or API
Bill information is retrieved successfully from BBPS API
Bill details are displayed correctly in the current and history sections of the dashboard

title: Bill Payment Using Credits
description: Verify that users can pay bills applying available credits both automatic and manual modes.

steps.description: Select outstanding bill from dashboard
Choose payment option applying available credits automatically
Credits are deducted from ledger accordingly
Bill payment is successfully marked paid with receipt generated
Repeat payment selecting manual credit application with partial credit use
Ledger and bill status update correctly

title: User Dashboard Data Real-time Update
description: Verify dashboard shows real-time savings summaries, graphs, and notifications with data refresh.

steps.description: Login and load dashboard page
Savings summary, monthly credit graph, project health, and environmental impact components display correct data
Trigger backend data update for credits and bills
Dashboard updates reflect new data within expected real-time latency

title: Referral Reward Flow
description: Verify new user signup with referral code properly rewards referrer after completion.

steps.description: Generate referral code as existing user
New user signs up using referral code and completes onboarding
Referrer's account is credited with referral rewards after new user completes valid actions

title: Notification Delivery and Handling
description: Verify real-time notifications for credits, payments, and system alerts appear timely and can be acknowledged.

steps.description: Trigger credit application event
User receives notification in notification center promptly
Trigger bill payment completion event
User receives payment confirmation notification
User views notifications and marks them as read
Notifications are updated as read and do not reappear as new

title: Export Savings and Analytics Report
description: Verify user can export savings and analytics data as report files.

steps.description: Access export functionality from dashboard or reports page
Select date range and export report
Report file downloads with correct data and format

title: Security - AES-256 Encryption and CSRF Token Validation
description: Verify sensitive data is encrypted with AES-256 and forms enforce CSRF token validation.

steps.description: Submit form containing sensitive data
Data stored in database is encrypted with AES-256
Submit form without valid CSRF token
Request is rejected due to invalid CSRF token

title: API Rate Limiting Enforcement
description: Verify APIs enforce rate limiting to prevent abuse and respond with appropriate errors upon rate exceeded.

steps.description: Send successive API requests rapidly exceeding allowed threshold
Server responds with rate limit exceeded error (HTTP 429)

title: XSS Protection in User Inputs
description: Verify frontend and backend properly sanitize inputs to prevent cross-site scripting.

steps.description: Attempt to submit scripts or malicious inputs in form fields across the application
Inputs are sanitized and scripts are not executed in UI or stored in database

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that user roles restrict access to protected API routes and UI sections appropriately.

steps.description: Login as a regular user and attempt to access admin-only pages or actions
Access is denied and user is redirected or shown forbidden message
Login as admin and access protected routes successfully
Admin access granted without error

title: API Health Check Endpoint Functional
description: Verify the health check endpoint returns correct status indicating system health.

steps.description: Send request to API health check endpoint
Endpoint responds with healthy status, uptime, and any relevant metrics

title: PWA Offline Capabilities
description: Verify that the Progressive Web App works offline using cached assets and service workers.

steps.description: Load the PWA in a browser and cache app shell
Turn off network connection and navigate the app
App content is accessible offline with correct UI and no errors

title: User Session Management and Logout
description: Verify user sessions are managed properly with timeout and logout functionality.

steps.description: Login and stay idle to exceed session timeout period
User session expires and login is required again
Login and use UI to logout
User is logged out and redirected to login page

title: Referral Code Generation and Validation
description: Verify generation of referral codes and validation during new user signup.

steps.description: Generate referral code from referrer user dashboard
Referral code is unique and valid
Use referral code during new user signup
Referral code is accepted and tracked

title: Data Export Security and Accuracy
description: Verify that only authorized users can export data and exported files contain accurate data.

steps.description: Attempt data export as authenticated user
Export is permitted and data matches report parameters
Attempt data export as unauthorized user or unauthenticated request
Export is denied and error returned

title: System Uptime and Error Rate Monitoring
description: Verify monitoring system accurately reports 99.9% uptime and error rates below 0.1%.

steps.description: Simulate normal and error conditions
Monitoring dashboard reports uptime ≥ 99.9% and error rates ≤ 0.1%

title: API Response Time Validation
description: Verify that all APIs respond within 200ms at 95th percentile under normal load.

steps.description: Execute multiple API calls simulating real user actions
Response time is less than 200ms for 95% of requests

title: Audit Logging of User Activities
description: Verify user activities including logins, payments, overrides, and data changes are logged correctly.

steps.description: Perform sensitive operations as a user, including login, payment, credit overrides
Audit logs contain entries with correct user, timestamp, and action details
